system.description: An electrical discharge strikes one primary target (1d6 electricity per caster level, max 20d6), then arcs to secondary targets (one per caster level, max 20), each within 30 ft. of the primary. Secondary bolts deal half the primary damage (rounded down). Each target gets Reflex half. You choose secondary targets; no target can be struck more than once. You may affect fewer than the maximum.

components.materialDescription: A bit of fur; a piece of amber, glass, or crystal rod; plus one silver pin per caster level (focus).

system.target: One primary target, plus one secondary/level within 30 ft. of primary
